message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with information theoretic security and error correction, which are typically studied in the information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR) sub-categories. The focus on authentication also suggests the cyber security (cs.CY) sub-category. The use of encoding and decoding techniques suggests the signal processing (cs.SI) sub-category. Finally, the mention of composition with other protocols suggests the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category, which often deals with combining different algorithms and models.
